row.entry: Highpass acts as a high pass filter. The primary usage for this filter is in combination with a blending operator. Try out blend mode soft light to get highpass sharpening. Use the opacity slider to adjust the strength of the effect or use drawn masks (see ) or parametric masks (see ) to limit the effect to only parts of your image.

sect5.title: sharpen
sect5.para: Set the sharpness. The higher, the more details.
